trans-unit.source: Click on any icon to add, edit or remove.
Start by Drag and Drop some structures or select a template from list.
This text is displayed in the inbox of the recipient.
Leave empty to make it transparent
Leave empty to use standard fonts.
Fallback font is used in case custom font is not supported.
Background image has limited support in some Outlook versions.
There are unsaved changes, are you sure you want to leave the page?
Alternative text to show in case image was blocked.
Link to redirect to on click
